title: Roman Property Law
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Roman Property Law.

hook.text: Rome built an empire on roads, legions, and one quiet innovation: written property law.

buildup.text: The Twelve Tables, carved around 450 BCE, gave citizens the right to own, sell, and inherit land.

punchline.text: Your deed traces back to Roman legal code.
